description: This file implements a Flutter UI screen called FilterScreen, which includes filtering options such as height, weight, hair color, ethnicity, religion, with support for resetting, applying, and initial focus/navigation. It is composed of multiple nested widgets managing user interaction with filtering criteria.

classes.name: FilterScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that provides a filter UI screen with options and actions.

classes.name: _FilterBody
classes.description: A stateful widget managing the dynamic content of filter options, scrolling to initial section, and containing filter sections.

classes.name: _FilterBodyState
classes.description: State object for _FilterBody managing filter option states, scrolling, and animations.

classes.name: _AnimatedSectionCard
classes.description: A widget that adds a pulsing animation highlight to a section when activated.

classes.name: _SectionCard
classes.description: A container widget for each filter section, including header, helper text, and child content.

classes.name: _SectionHeader
classes.description: A widget displaying the section title and icon, optionally with a trailing range chip.

classes.name: _HeaderChip
classes.description: A styled label used in headers to display current range or status.

methods.name: _onReset
methods.description: Resets the filters via provider and shows a snackbar confirmation.

methods.name: _onResetLocal
methods.description: Resets the local filter state copies and shows a snackbar.

methods.name: _enumLabel
methods.description: Converts enum name strings to human-readable labels.
